mapper.sql: pm_project.project_id as project_id, pm_project.project_name as project_name, pm_project.project_icon as project_icon, pm_project.project_area as project_area, pm_project.project_customer as project_customer, pm_project.start_date as project_start_date, pm_project.end_date as project_end_date, pm_project.created_by_id as created_by_id, pm_project.created_date as created_date, pm_project.describe as describe, pm_project.del_flag as del_flag
pm_user.id as user_id, pm_user.username as username, pm_user.real_name as real_name, pm_user.head_portrait as head_portrait, pm_user.nickname as nickname, pm_user.authority as authority
mapper.select: SELECT , r.user_id, r.username, r.real_name, r.head_portrait, r.nickname, r.authority, r.is_manager, r.is_leader FROM ( SELECT pu.project_id, u.id as user_id, u.username as username, u.real_name as real_name, u.head_portrait as head_portrait, u.nickname as nickname, u.authority as authority, u.is_manager as is_manager, u.is_leader as is_leader FROM pm_project_user pu RIGHT JOIN pm_user u ON pu.user_id = u.id ) r LEFT JOIN pm_project ON pm_project.project_id = r.project_id WHERE pm_project.project_name = #{projectName} AND pm_project.del_flag = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pm_project(project_name, project_icon, project_area, project_customer, start_date, end_date, created_by_id, created_date, `describe`) VALUES(#{projectDto.projectName}, #{projectDto.projectIcon}, #{projectDto.projectArea}, #{projectDto.projectCustomer}, #{projectDto.startDate}, #{projectDto.endDate}, #{projectDto.createdById}, #{projectDto.createdDate}, #{projectDto.describe})
mapper.update: UPDATE pm_project SET pm_project.del_flag = #{delFlag} WHERE pm_project.project_id = #{projectId}
